feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 7:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning except snow over the Highlands late in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
